entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect IL2059 for `RunClassConstructor` on any `System.Nullable<T>` instantiation #106939
  • [QUIC] Issue with `AcceptInboundStreamAsync()` Hanging and Failing to Accept Inbound Streams #106938
  • How to use proxy on Windows and Linux when PAC file is used #106933
  • `SortedSet<T>.SortedSetEquals` is not correct when the sets have different comparers #106932
  • [API Proposal]: Option validation features for `IServiceCollection` #106931
    Future

Closed

  • ConfigurationBinder.Get binds empty IDictionary<string, string> as null #106820
    Future
  • Disallow nonexistent DateTime creation #106821
  • Port System.Net docs for .NET 9 APIs #106789
    9.0.0
  • NET9 System.TimeSpan.FromSeconds(5) does not compile any more in mixed mode c++ cli with .NET9 preview 7 and VS 2022 17.12 preview due to ambigous type (either long long or double but not int directly) #106935
    9.0.0
  • 3x perf regression on 13th Gen Intel Core (i7-13800H) maybe in readonly struct passed by ref #106679
    9.0.0
  • Consider updating to macosx-version-min=10.14 #48721
    Future
  • Rework how we determine if we can do a managed build or not #5967
    Future
  • For .NET Core 2.1, the CoreCLR symbols are missing for IL symbols. #33550
    Future
  • Make AzDO builds use artifacts dir laid out the same as local build's artifacts dir #1030
    Future
  • Share yml templates between runtimes #2029
    Future
  • Collapse jobs in official builds #45396
    Future
  • Enable AddressSanitizer on Debug and Checked builds for both MSVC and Clang #52131
    Future
  • Failure to restore 2.1.808 SDK dependency #48443
    Future
  • Ensure we are building against LTTng with latest fixes #63407
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] JIT: emit vzeroupper before calls to the bulk write barrier helper #106937
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize write barriers for server gc on arm64 #106934
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix logging formatting #106367
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.10
  • JIT: emit vzeroupper before calls to the bulk write barrier helper #106908
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "[LoongArch64] Add proj to generate nupkg runtime.linux-loongarch64.runtime.native.System.IO.Ports" #106882
    area-System.IO, arch-loongarch64

Updated

  • Generic Enumerable.Range method #106925
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2523809 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Set GC metrics to zero prior to first GC #106734
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • Add lld in dependency script #106913
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    NO-MERGE, area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Use TestExclusionList in bringup_runtest.sh #106201
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
